noun.description: A test of knowledge, especially a brief, informal test given to students.

examples: four men have been quizzed about the murder

origin: Late 18th century: sometimes said to have been invented by a Dublin theater proprietor who, having made a bet that a nonsense word could be made known within 48 hours throughout the city, and that the public would give it a meaning, had the word written up on walls all over the city. There is no evidence to support this theory.
